title: COVID-19 Rapid Testing (Jan. 8, 2022)
cleaned_text: How reliable are at-home COVID-19 tests? Are there shortcomings to "testing out" of vaccine mandates? IDSA members Dial Hewlett, MD, FIDSA of the Westchester County Health Department and Nira Pollock, MD, FIDSA of Boston Children's Hospital join us to discuss the latest on COVID-19 testing. *This episode was recorded on December 6, 2021. *This podcast episode was funded by a cooperative agreement with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (grant number NU50CK000574). The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is an agency within the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS).
